lead_paragraph: An article on April 1 about the weather-related decision to move the opening-day game at Yankee Stadium to the next night gave an incorrect number from the Yankees for previous nighttime openers at the Stadium. It was at least two, not one. (Besides the 2005 night opener noted in the article, another was in 1972.).
